methodology: Simulated 100 student profiles against 18 scholarships, counted ineligible matches shown

root_causes.description: Students with GPA below min_gpa requirement seeing scholarships they cannot apply for
Scholarships with past deadlines appearing in search results (9 of 18 have expired deadlines)
Students in non-matching fields_of_study seeing field-restricted scholarships
Students in wrong state seeing state-restricted scholarships (e.g., CA, NY, TX only)

recommendation: Implement hard filters for deadline, GPA, residency, and major in hybrid search
